attributes.action: Campaign for REAL Democracy. No political parties, representatives voted from the communities they live in. ALL COMMUNITIES. nonpartisan government!
attributes.additional_details:
·Each area votes for one of their own to sit on a local council,
·Who then vote one member from their number to sit on a national government.
Imagine, the representative from Manchester Moss side, lives in Moss side, Not London. Imagine voting for someone you actually know and respect.
Our national representative would live locally to and so would be aware of all local issues as well as the local opinion on the national ones.
No more party politics doing what they choose.
·Utilise the Internet to let us vote for key decisions such as Europe, Immigration, Taxes, Benefits.
 Or to help show us how our tax money is spent, allowing us to vote on whether we agree or not.
It is not change, but the evolution of our current system.
Lets change the law and ban political parties.
